description.narrative: 106/003 Governments and partners have increased capacity to provide continued access to WASH services and critical supplies for women and children for strengthening Infection Prevention and Control and for suppressing the COVID-19 transmission at community level.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents
